projects.project_title: AI Chatbot Development for Efficient Data Processing
details: Developed a high-accuracy AI chatbot utilizing Talend's data manipulation capabilities to streamline FAQs about Nanyang Technological University, achieving a remarkable 90% response accuracy with automated data processing and quality control.

Optimized performance and enhanced response accuracy by integrating OpenAI's embedding model, Google Cloud's Vertex AI, and ChromaDB, showcasing expertise in scalability, data pipeline development, and applied data engineering principles.

Designed and developed efficient ETL workflows for high-quality data processing and effective database design for both relational and NoSQL databases, ensuring seamless data integration and streamlined data management.
Designed and developed a scalable data pipeline using Apache Spark, Python, and Python libraries, showcasing expertise in data processing and integration.

Collaborated with stakeholders to understand data requirements, ensuring timely and effective data delivery through optimized workflows, demonstrating strong communication and project management skills.
Developed and maintained ETL workflows and data pipelines, utilizing Talend, demonstrating proficiency in the technology and ability to apply it in a real-world setting.

Integrated Zoho CRM with a full-stack web application to enhance customer-facing processes and lead management with increased efficiency and responsiveness, showcasing expertise in web development and integration.

Designed and implemented secure database schemas in MySQL, leveraging prepared statements and data sanitization for robust data protection, demonstrating knowledge of database security and best practices.

Ensured responsive backend functionalities using PHP and JavaScript for server-side scripting, resulting in improved overall application performance, highlighting attention to detail and ability to optimize code.

Developed front-end interfaces for Decentralized Applications (DApps) using React and Tailwind CSS, delivering a modern and user-friendly interface, demonstrating proficiency in front-end development and design principles.

Composed highly efficient and secure smart contracts using Pyteal and JavaScript for various DApps features, ensuring robust and reliable functionality, showcasing expertise in smart contract development and blockchain technologies.

Autored comprehensive test cases using Mocha Testing Framework and conducted end-to-end testing for successful deployment, ensuring defect-free deployment, highlighting attention to detail and commitment to quality.
Developed and coordinated data-driven activities for 250 freshmen, showcasing analytical skills and ability to work with large datasets
Assembled and led Programme Committee, demonstrating leadership and project management skills to deliver a successful event
Utilized problem-solving and analytical skills to overcome logistical challenges and ensureevent success
